snippet: Iman Shumpert has earned a starting job and consistent praise as a top young defender. But in Coach Mike Woodson's old-school view, he has not earned the honor of being called by his given name.
abstract: Iman Shumpert has earned a starting job and consistent praise as a top young defender. But in Coach Mike Woodson's old-school view, he has not earned the honor of being called by his given name.

headline.main: Knicks Rookie Hears Plenty of Praise, Little of His Name
